name: ReplaceDraftTableRow
description:
Replace a row in the draft version of a HubDB table.

This tool replaces a single row in the draft version of a specified HubDB table. All column values must be provided. Omitted columns will be deleted from the row.

parameters.name: table_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the HubDB table to replace the row in.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the table

parameters.name: row_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the row to be replaced in the draft table.

parameters.name: row_data
parameters.description: JSON object specifying the values for each column in the row, including 'path', 'childTableId', 'values', 'name', and 'displayIndex'.

path.description: Specifies the value for `hs_path` column, which will be used as slug in the dynamic pages

childTableId.description: Specifies the value for the column child table id

values.description: List of key value pairs with the column name and column value

name.description: Specifies the value for `hs_name` column, which will be used as title in the dynamic pages

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: tableIdOrName
parameters.description: The ID or name of the table

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the table

path.description: Specifies the value for `hs_path` column, which will be used as slug in the dynamic pages

childTableId.description: Specifies the value for the column child table id

values.description: List of key value pairs with the column name and column value

name.description: Specifies the value for `hs_name` column, which will be used as title in the dynamic pages

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
